events.title: Club Expo
events.description: Presenting the club to new students and recruiting new members.

events.title: Club Executive Meet and Greet
events.description: Meet the club executives and learn about the club's goals and our plans for the future

events.title: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence
events.description: Learn the fundamentals of artificial intelligence, focusing on the history, different types of algorithms, and how you can learn about it.

events.title: CUHacking AI Workshop
events.description: Hackathon workshop on how to implement Ollama and HuggingFace models in your projects. Also, mentorship access to hackathon participants.

events.title: Build Your Own Neural Network
events.description: Beginner workshop on implementing neural networks and a demo on how to build your own model.

events.title: Using AI APIs
events.description: Learn how to use AI APIs to implement AI in your projects.
